name: Smurf Play & Learn
summary: Smurf Play & Learn Cartridge and Screenshot. Players must solve basic learning tasks (like addition and subtraction) to return the Smurfs safely home to their village and away from Gargamel's Castle. Although preliminary artwork was created, this game was never released. Smurf Play & Learn Screen Grab and Cartridge. For use with the ColecoVision.
